cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Theme__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Theme__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Theme__c.description: Represents the themes of a mobile app.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: Date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: Unique identification of the mobile app theme.

cgc_sync_Attachment_Id__c.description: Refers to the theme icon or image file.

cgc_sync_Label_Languages__c.description: The key-value pair of language codes and related translated label text for the theme name. For example, {"en": "Dark Theme", "de" : "dunkles theme"}

cgc_sync_isActive__c.description: Indicates whether the theme is active (true) or not (false). Only active themes are available on the mobile device.

cgc_sync_isCore__c.description: Indicates whether the theme is editable (false) or not (true). If set as true, the client or project cannot edit the theme.

cgc_sync_isDefault__c.description: Indicates whether the theme is a default theme (true) or not (false).
